help_user_content: â–¶ï¸ Playback: â€¢ /play [song] â€” Play audio in VC ğŸ›  Utilities: â€¢ /start â€” Intro message â€¢ /privacy â€” Privacy policy â€¢ /queue â€” View track queue
help_admin_content: ğŸ› Playback Controls: â€¢ /skip â€” Skip current track â€¢ /pause â€” Pause playback â€¢ /resume â€” Resume playback â€¢ /seek [sec] â€” Jump to a position ğŸ“‹ Queue Management: â€¢ /remove [x] â€” Remove track number x â€¢ /loop [0-10] â€” Repeat queue x times ğŸ‘‘ Permissions: â€¢ /auth [reply] â€” Grant approval â€¢ /unauth [reply] â€” Revoke authorization â€¢ /authlist â€” View authorized users
help_devs_content: ğŸ“Š System Tools: â€¢ /stats â€” Show usage stats ğŸ§¹ Maintenance: â€¢ /av â€” Show active voice chats
help_category_text: %s %s ğŸ”™ Use buttons below to go back.
privacy_policy: Privacy Policy for %s: 1. Data Storage: - %s does not store any personal data on the user's device. - We do not collect or store any data about your device or personal browsing activity. 2. What We Collect: - We only collect your Telegram user ID and chat ID to provide the music streaming and interaction functionalities of the bot. - No personal data such as your name, phone number, or location is collected. 3. Data Usage: - The collected data (Telegram UserID, ChatID) is used strictly to provide the music streaming and interaction functionalities of the bot. - We do not use this data for any marketing or commercial purposes. 4. Data Sharing: - We do not share any of your personal or chat data with any third parties, organizations, or individuals. - No sensitive data is sold, rented, or traded to any outside entities. 5. Data Security: - We take reasonable security measures to protect the data we collect. This includes standard practices like encryption and safe storage. - However, we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your data, as no online service is 100%% secure. 6. Cookies and Tracking: - %s does not use cookies or similar tracking technologies to collect personal information or track your behavior. 7. Third-Party Services: - %s does not integrate with any third-party services that collect or process your personal information, aside from Telegram's own infrastructure. 8. Your Rights: - You have the right to request the deletion of your data. Since we only store your Telegram ID and chat ID temporarily to function properly, these can be removed upon request. - You may also revoke access to the bot at any time by removing or blocking it from your chats. 9. Changes to the Privacy Policy: - We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be communicated through updates within the bot. 10. Contact Us: If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy, feel free to contact us at Support Group â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ Note: This privacy policy is in place to help you understand how your data is handled and to ensure that your experience with %s is safe and respectful.
